ูุฐุง ููู schema.prisma ุงูุฐู ูุชุจุชูุ ูุฑุฌู ูุฑุงุฌุนุชู ูุงูุชุฑุงุญ ุชุญุณููุงุช.

```prisma
model User {
  id String @id @default(cuid())
  email String @unique
  password String
  role String
  posts Post[]
}

model Post {
  id String @id @default(cuid())
  title String
  content String?
  author User @relation(fields: [authorId], references: [id])
  authorId String
}
```
